reasoning_modules.description: Analyze the task to identify key steps and required inputs and outputs for each step.
Design input and output interfaces for each step, specifying the data format and interaction mechanisms.
Prepare for code generation by outlining the JavaScript functions and Chrome extension structure needed to automate browser navigation.
Implement each step in JavaScript, ensuring that the code interacts correctly with the designed interfaces and performs the intended navigation and data manipulation.
Test the automated steps individually and as a whole to ensure reliability and accuracy in browser navigation and task completion.
Incorporate error handling mechanisms to manage exceptions and unforeseen issues during automation.
Optimize the automation script for performance, including reducing execution time and resource consumption.
Document the automation process, including the purpose of each step, interface specifications, and code usage instructions.
